ORCID is for…

Universities & Research Institutes
Publishers
Vendors & Service Providers
Government & Policy Makers
Funders & Facilities

ORCID is a free, unique, persistent identifier (PID) for individuals to use as they engage in research, scholarship, and innovation activities. Learn how ORCID can help you spend more time conducting your research and less time managing it. Learn more.

<<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> 3b7ecb6d0a668d48b6ae27a26e1986cfc455a466

Uniquely Yours

Distinguish yourself and claim credit for your work no matter how many people have your same (or similar) name. Sign up here.

<<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> 3b7ecb6d0a668d48b6ae27a26e1986cfc455a466

Portable profile data

Easily share data between your record and funding, publications, data repositories, and other research workflows.

ORCID allows universities and research institutions to stay up to date with their researchers’ outputs, reduce administrative burden and input errors, and helps their researchers, post-docs, employees, and students improve the discoverability of their work. Learn more.

Support research productivity

Let your researchers spend more time on their research by reducing administrative burden

Track Careers

Track researchers’ and graduates’ careers after they leave your institution as well as collaborators and peers at other institutions.

Publishers that integrate with ORCID can streamline workflows for authors, editors, and reviewers alike. ORCID improves the overall value of books and journals to the community, helping ensure that publishers have greater retention of authors and readers. Learn more.

<<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> 3b7ecb6d0a668d48b6ae27a26e1986cfc455a466

Know your authors

Better know who your authors, co-authors, and reviewers are and improve the integrity of your submission, review, and reporting processes.

Improve discoverability

Help your authors improve their visibility and improve the discoverability of their works and contributions by the scholarly community.

Vendors and service providers that connect their services to the ORCID Registry join our ecosystem of over 5,000 ORCID-integrated systems. Providing this service increases the value they provide to the scholarly community with authoritative, high-quality profile data. Learn more.

 Improve discoverability

Increase the value you provide to the scholarly community with authoritative, high-quality profile data.

ORCID helps governments and policy makers elevate the integrity of their region’s research with trustworthy data, which serves to better align research and national PID and infrastructure strategies with global community standards. Learn more.

Align research strategy

Better align your research, PID, or infrastructure strategy with global community standards

ORCID integrated systems reduce administrative burden for research funding agencies and major facilities that award access to resources. With less time and effort spent administering awards, they can better measure the impact of their awards. Learn more.

FEATURED NEWS

<<<<<<< HEAD

ORCID’s 2024 Annual Report and Town Hall Meeting

ORCID’s 2024 Annual Report and corresponding Town Hall meetings offer a glimpse at ORCID’s successes over the past year, including progress on From Vision to Value: ORCID’s 2022–2025 Strategic Plan. Our momentum in five strategic areas continues to demonstrate the growing value of ORCID as an essential piece of global research infrastructure.

If you missed the Town Hall, you can catch a short summarized version in our ORCID Short: Progress & Plans, as well as the full Town Hall recording, and the downloadable presentation.

=======

ORCID’s Privacy Policy

At ORCID, we recognize that upholding research integrity is a global challenge that demands community-driven solutions. In November 2024, Ellen Paterson, ORCID’s Data Protection Officer, hosted a webinar to discuss ORCID’s unwavering commitment to data privacy. In this session, Ellen covered recent updates to ORCID’s Privacy Policy, provided insights into her role has Data Protection Officer, and answered audience questions.

View highlights from Research Integrity: ORCID’s Privacy Policy below and check out the full session, available On-Demand.

>>>>>>> 3b7ecb6d0a668d48b6ae27a26e1986cfc455a466
<<<<<<< HEAD

ORCID Highlights from 2024

New work types for arts and humanities

We now offer 13 new work types that support a wider range of arts and humanities contributions.

Improving research trust and Integrity

We helped our member organizations understand how ORCID helps address the research integrity crisis with new Record Summaries and messaging around our Community Trust Network and Trust Markers.

=======

More on ORCID’s commitment to Privacy

ORCID Celebrates Data Privacy Day 2025

In late January, ORCID participated in Data Privacy Day to help raise awareness of privacy and how it affects us all. Read the blog post to learn about some of our own recent developments in this area.

2024 updates to ORCID’s Privacy Policy

Keeping ORCID Trusted and Trustworthy.

Privacy is and has always been a fundamental concern for ORCID and is reflected in our founding principles and values, in our Strategic Priorities, as well as in our day to day operations. Learn more about the updates made to our Privacy Policy.

>>>>>>> 3b7ecb6d0a668d48b6ae27a26e1986cfc455a466
<<<<<<< HEAD

Increasing global uptake of ORCID

Our Global Participation Fund is achieving its aim of increasing global uptake of ORCID. We also welcomed two new consortia—Lebanon and Nigeria—and celebrated strong growth in others, including the LATAM Regional Consortium.

=======

From our archives: Five easy ways to get the most out of ORCID

In this December 2021 blog post, we discuss the value of a well-populated ORCID record to the entire research ecosystem, and offer five easy tips for both researchers (to ensure they can get the most out of their records) and ORCID members (to help make ORCID more useful for their researchers and for their organization).
